original_text: And the four wheels were underneath the panels. The axles of the wheels were of one piece with the stands, and the height of a wheel was a cubit and a half.
korean_text: 네 바퀴는 옆판 밑에 있고 바퀴 축은 받침 수레에 연결되었는데 바퀴의 높이는 각각 한 규빗 반이며

sentences.original_text: And the four wheels were underneath the panels.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 바퀴는 판들 아래에 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: The axles of the wheels were of one piece with the stands
and the height of a wheel was a cubit and a half.
sentences.korean_translation: 한 바퀴의 높이는 한 규빗 반입니다.
